settings.title: SHIPPING DAYS
settings.text:
Orders are packed on Mondays and Thursdays, excluding holidays.

Packages are picked up by the USPS at the end of the day, and may not scan packages until the next business day.

settings.title: SHIPPING TIME
settings.text:
Free Shipping will ship USPS Media Mail, which takes approx. 7-10 business days.

USPS no longer gaurantees Priority Shipping in 3 days. Allow additional time for deliveries, even if you've paid for upgraded service.

settings.title: Questions?
settings.text:
Email hello@theeverydaymother
Mon/Thu 9am-2pm

Visit us on IG for recent updates and news
